about_the_game:
This pack is for the people that wish to support the development of the game further, hence is in no way needed to get the full experience of the game


Included in this pack:

  • Exclusive Dark Elf Skin for the Medieval Army
  • Exclusive Loading Screen Border
  • 750 In-game Dimensional Gems
detailed_description:
This pack is for the people that wish to support the development of the game further, hence is in no way needed to get the full experience of the game


Included in this pack:

  • Exclusive Dark Elf Skin for the Medieval Army
  • Exclusive Loading Screen Border
  • 750 In-game Dimensional Gems
name: King of the World - Supporters Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: King of the World - Supporters Pack - $4.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy King of the World - Supporters Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3Ghz Intel i5 quad core or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 780
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: For the people that wish to further support the game, and in return gets an exclusive skin and loading frame.
